channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: #ElectionsWithHT | In Ganderbal, National Conference Vice Pr
item.description: #ElectionsWithHT | In Ganderbal, National Conference Vice President #OmarAbdullah declared a united front against the BJP in the upcoming J&K Assembly elections. #JammuKashmirElections

item.title: #ShabanaAzmi reflects on the current re-release trend in Ind
item.description: #ShabanaAzmi reflects on the current re-release trend in India and if she wants any of her films to re-release

item.title: The parents of the #Kolkata doctor received three calls on t
item.description: The parents of the #Kolkata doctor received three calls on the night of the crime from an employee of the #RGKarHospital. In all three calls, the man refused to divulge what had happened to the 31-year-old woman. Read full story here: https://www.hindustantimes.com/.../kolkata-rape-murder...
